documentation.title: KoolComboboxItem Class [PHP]
documentation.metakeywords: php combobox,php ajax combobox, php combo box,php dropdown list
documentation.metadescription: KoolComboBox extends the capability of combobox to the max.Easy-to-use, highly customized interface, advanced behavior options are the strongest points that make KoolComboBox better than any other industrial similar controls.

property.longdesc: Get or set whether a item is enabled

property.longdesc: Get or set whether a item is selected

property.name: data
property.shortdesc: Get or set data of item
property.longdesc: Get or set data of item. The values from this data array will be used to render item.
property.samplecode:
<?php
	$item = $Koo->addItem("Software","soft");
	$item->data["image"] = "resources/software.gif";
	//Add image to data array of item 
	$item->data["anykey"] = "Any value"; 
?>
